metadata.title: CVE-2017-2377 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 10.3 isaffected. Safari before 10.1 is affected. The issue involves the "WebKitWeb Inspector" component. It allows attackers to cause a denial of service(memory corruption and application crash) by leveraging a window-closeaction during a debugger-pause state.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2377` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.16.1-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.16.1-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.16.1-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.16.1-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.16.1-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.16.1-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.16.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.16.1-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
